short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that makes fiat prices display in Dogecoin. Works with USD, EUR, GBP, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the future of digital currency with our innovative browser extension that effortlessly converts fiat prices into Dogecoin values. The extension is designed to support USD, GBP, EUR, RUB, and INR currencies, and dynamically substitutes them on all web pages, creating a seamless and exciting browsing experience for cryptocurrency enthusiasts.

Key Features:

Auto-conversion: Our extension auto-detects fiat prices in USD, GBP, or EUR on any webpage and instantly translates them into Dogecoin equivalent.

Real-time updates: The extension ensures accurate conversions by fetching the latest Dogecoin price data every 2 minutes.

Comic Sans Mode: Enjoy the internet the way it was supposed to be enjoyed. In all comic sans!


Immerse yourself in the digital currency era and make browsing more informative and enjoyable with our Dogecoin conversion extension!
